name: Grey Feather
description:
Grey Feather centers around Doctor Avery, a 59 year old scientist who studies souls. One day he’s visited by someone who looks uncannily like his long-dead son. From there, he’s dragged into misadventures and conspiracies, and has to try to survive more than a few dangerous situations

Features 13 different endings, a side-story unlocked for each ending seen, as well as character profiles for every character that appears!
